Testing VHADDPS (128-bit)

Test 1: Basic values
Input A: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 
Input B: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 
Result: 3.000000 7.000000 11.000000 15.000000 
Expected: 3.000000 7.000000 11.000000 15.000000 
All elements passed

Test 2: Mixed zeros
Input A: 0.000000 -0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Input B: 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 -0.000000 
Result: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
Expected: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 -0.000000 
All elements passed

Test 3: NaN values
Input A: nan 1.000000 nan 2.000000 
Input B: 3.000000 nan 4.000000 nan 
Result: nan nan nan nan 
Expected: nan nan nan nan 
All elements passed

Test 4: SNaN values
Input A: 1.000000 nan 2.000000 3.000000 
Input B: 4.000000 5.000000 nan 6.000000 
Result: nan 5.000000 9.000000 nan 
Expected: nan 5.000000 9.000000 nan 
All elements passed

Test 5: Infinity values
Input A: inf 1.000000 -inf 2.000000 
Input B: 3.000000 inf 4.000000 -inf 
Result: inf -inf inf -inf 
Expected: inf -inf inf -inf 
All elements passed

Test 6: Denormal values
Input A: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input B: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Result: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Expected: 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
All elements passed

Test 7: Overflow values
Input A: 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 -99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 -99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 
Input B: 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 -99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 -99999996802856924650656260769173209088.000000 
Result: 199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 -199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 -199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 
Expected: 199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 -199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 -199999993605713849301312521538346418176.000000 
All elements passed

Testing VHADDPS (256-bit)

Test 1: Basic values
Input A: 1.000000 2.000000 3.000000 4.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Input B: 5.000000 6.000000 7.000000 8.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Result: 3.000000 7.000000 11.000000 15.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
Expected: 3.000000 7.000000 11.000000 15.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 0.000000 
All elements passed
